languages.text: Высокий фактотум вычислил, как генокрады попали в Простор. Если его теория верна, то Вольный Торговец обнаружит подтверждение этому в дрейфующих останках торгового корабля "Перст скорби".

The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.
languages.original_text: Высокий фактотум вычислил, как генокрады попали в Простор. Если его теория верна, то Вольный Торговец обнаружит подтверждение этому в дрейфующих останках торгового корабля "Перст скорби".

traits.locale_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers got into the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship "Finger of Sorrow".

languages.text: El Sumo Factótum ha deducido cómo llegaron los Genestealers a la Extensión. Si está en lo cierto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente encontrará las pruebas en los restos a la deriva de la nave mercantil Dedo del Pesar.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: El Sumo Factótum ha deducido cómo llegaron los Genestealers a la Extensión. Si está en lo cierto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente encontrará las pruebas en los restos a la deriva de la nave mercantil Dedo del Pesar.

languages.text: ハイ・ファクトタムはジーンスティーラーが元々どのようにしてエクスパンスに到着したのかを推理した。彼の理論が正しければ、ローグトレーダーは漂流する商船『悲しみの指』の残骸の中に証拠を見つけるだろう。
languages.original_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: ハイ・ファクトタムはジーンスティーラーが元々どのようにしてエクスパンスに到着したのかを推理した。彼の理論が正しければ、ローグトレーダーは漂流する商船『悲しみの指』の残骸の中に証拠を見つけるだろう。

languages.text: 高阶顾问已经推断出基因窃取者是如何抵达科罗努斯扩区的。如果他的推测正确，行商浪人应该可以在‘悲伤之指号’商船的残骸中找到相关证据。
languages.original_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: 高阶顾问已经推断出基因窃取者是如何抵达科罗努斯扩区的。如果他的推测正确，行商浪人应该可以在‘悲伤之指号’商船的残骸中找到相关证据。

languages.text: Das Hoch-Faktotum hat rekonstruiert, wie die Symbionten ursprünglich in die Ausdehnung gelangt sind. Falls seine Theorie stimmt, wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Beweise in den dahintreibenden Überresten des Handelsschiffs Finger des Leids finden.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: Das Hoch-Faktotum hat rekonstruiert, wie die Symbionten ursprünglich in die Ausdehnung gelangt sind. Falls seine Theorie stimmt, wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Beweise in den dahintreibenden Überresten des Handelsschiffs Finger des Leids finden.

languages.text: Le haut factotum a mené l'enquête et découvert comment les Genestealers sont arrivés dans les Étendues. Si sa théorie s'avère exacte, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} trouvera des preuves dans l'épave à la dérive du vaisseau marchand dénommé l'Index du Malheur.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: Le haut factotum a mené l'enquête et découvert comment les Genestealers sont arrivés dans les Étendues. Si sa théorie s'avère exacte, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} trouvera des preuves dans l'épave à la dérive du vaisseau marchand dénommé l'Index du Malheur.

languages.text: Arşıkâhya'nın, Gençalanların Enginlik'e ilk nasıl geldikleri konusunda bazı çıkarımları var. Eğer teorisi doğruysa Hür Tacir, gereken kanıtı tüccar gemisi Keder Parmağı'nın uzayda sürüklenen kalıntılarında bulacaktır.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum has deduced how the Genestealers originally arrived in the Expanse. If his theory is correct, the Rogue Trader will find evidence inside the drifting remains of the merchant ship Finger of Sorrow.
